Title: Object: La fuite en Egypte
Series: Galerie du Musée Napoléon
Series: Musée Napoléon
Series: Galerie Napoléon
Description: Plate 68: The Flight into Egypt; classical scene with the Holy Family stepping over rocks in foreground, the Virgin carrying the Child while Joseph holds the donkey; after Adriaen van der Werff. c.1828 Etching and engraving
Curator's comments: Plate 68 from 'Galerie du Musée Napoléon', see 1856,0308.625 for comment. After the 1710 painting by Adriaen van der Werff in the Mauritshuis, The Hague, inv.no.209; see Barbara Gaehtgens, 'Adriaen van der Werff 1659-1722', Munich, 1987, cat.no.74. It was painted on the occasion of the eightteenth brithday of the artist's daughter Maria.
Bibliographic references: IFF / Inventaire du Fonds Français: Bibliothèque Nationale, Département des Estampes (11) (Bovinet)
